TtForm.Name: Epic Base State Form
TtForm.InvalidFieldText: One or more fields are invalid.
TtForm.RequiredFieldText: '{0}' is a required field. Please supply a valid value to complete this transition.
TtForm.SSOPreviewText: Preview only supports SSO authentication if you are logged in to the repository. In the User Workspace, customers will see the Web page located at: {0}
TtForm.SSONoTokenText: Unable to retrieve a valid Security Token for request to: {0}.
TtForm.PDFMissingText: Download Adobe Acrobat Reader in order to view this PDF.
TtForm.ReportPreviewText: Preview does not support embedded reports. In the User Workspace, customers will see the report located at: {0}
TtForm.WeCouldNotLocateErrorText: We could not locate all of the data needed to perform your request.
TtForm.YouMayNotHavePermissionsErrorText: You may not have permission to access these fields.
TtForm.WeDidNotFindAnyMatchesErrorText: REST service call failed. Check the authentication settings of the endpoint used by this REST grid in Application Repository.
TtForm.PleaseTryRestrictingTheDataErrorText: Please try restricting the data returned by adjusting the input parameters.
TtForm.AuthorizationFailedErrorText: Authorization failed - check the Screen Name and Password
TtForm.StatusPostErrorText: An error occured posting the status update
TtForm.TheRestGridIsNotConfigured: The REST Grid is not configured:

TtLabel.name: Title/Summary
TtLabel.Description: High-level summary of the change being requested, expressed clearly enough for non-technical staff to comprehend

TtLabel.name: Description
TtLabel.Description: Detailed description of the change being requested, specifying affected components/subsystems, and to what degree items will be changed

TtLabel.name: Requirement Statement/User Story
TtLabel.Description: The applicable requirement statement or user story addressed by the CR

TtLabel.name: Issue Type
TtLabel.Description: Selection of issue type that made the change request necessary (Defect/SIR, SCR-T, or SCR-F)

TtLabel.name: SDD Application
TtLabel.Description: Selection of SDD application being changed

TtLabel.name: SDD Application Module(s)
TtLabel.Description: An optional subcomponent of the SDD Application, if so used by the product team

TtLabel.name: Tag/Label
TtLabel.Description: Optional categorical words to be applied to the CR record, for later use by the product team

GenericWidget.name: ActionList
GenericWidget.GlobalContent: <script type="text/javascript" src="$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/javascript/ActionListExt.js"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/styles/actionList-1.0.css"></link>
GenericWidget.Template: <script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/javascript/ActionListUtilities.js\"></'+'script>\ <script>\ var ActionListParams = [];\ var ActionListCheckFilter = function(a){\ if(a.name && a.value){\ var ActionListPrefixed = /^F_TS_.+/i.test(a.name);\ if (!ActionListPrefixed){\ var ActionListTemp = \"F_TS_\"+a.name;\ a.name = ActionListTemp;\ }\ ActionListParams.push(a);\ }\ };\ \ ActionListCheckFilter({name:\'F_TS_CHANGE_REQUEST\',value:\'{0}\'});\ ActionListCheckFilter({name:\'F_TS_ACTIVEINACTIVE\',value:\'0\'});\ ActionListCheckFilter({});\ ActionListCheckFilter({});\ ActionListCheckFilter({});\ ActionListCheckFilter({});\ ActionListCheckFilter({});\ \ var ActionListSize;\ switch (\"Large\"){\ case \"Small\":\ ActionListSize = { width: \"500\", height: \"400\" };\ break;\ case \"Medium\":\ ActionListSize = { width: \"900\", height: \"600\" };\ break;\ case \"Large\":\ ActionListSize = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ break;\ case \"Full Screen\":\ ActionListSize = { width: \"100%\", height: \"100%\" };\ break;\ default:\ ActionListSize = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ }\ \ jQuerySBM(document).ready(function() {\ jQuerySBM(\"#ActionListWrapper\").actionList({\ reportID: \"abd7061c-91a2-4c70-90ec-dc1ac8d5d7b0\",\ AppRptProjId: \"I_USR_SDDCRS_TASKS.CRS_TASKS_PROJECT\",\ reportParams: ActionListParams,\ groupByField: \"State\",\ dialogSize: ActionListSize,\ emptyFieldText: \"(None)\",\ widgetName: \"ActionList\"\ });\ }); \ </'+'script>\

TtLabel.name: Owner
TtLabel.Description: The primary person who currently owns the item

TtLabel.name: Project
TtLabel.Description: The project in which this item resides

TtLabel.name: Submit Date
TtLabel.Description: The date that the item was created/submitted

TtLabel.name: Last Modifier
TtLabel.Description: The last person to change the data in this item

TtLabel.name: Date Last Modified
TtLabel.Description: The last time the item's data was changed

TtLabel.name: Last State Changer
TtLabel.Description: The last person to change the state of this item

TtLabel.name: Date Last State Change
TtLabel.Description: The last time the state of this item was changed

TtLabel.name: Active/Inactive
TtLabel.Description: Whether the item is active or inactive in its current state

TtLabel.name: Close Date
TtLabel.Description: The date that the item was closed

TtLabel.name: Item Id
TtLabel.Description: The displayed identifier of the item
